section.name: Tomcat Connectors (mod_jk) Downloads
section.p: Use the links below to download the Apache Tomcat® Connectors software from one of our mirrors. You must verify the integrity of the downloaded files using signatures downloaded from our main distribution directory.

Only current recommended releases are available on the main distribution site and its mirrors. Older releases and the historical mod_jk2 are available from the
archive download site.
Recent releases (48 hours) may not yet be available from the mirrors.

subsection.name: Choose a Mirror
subsection.p:
You are currently using [preferred]. If you encounter a problem with this mirror, please select another mirror. If all mirrors are failing, there are backup mirrors (at the end of the mirrors list) that should be available.
[if-any logo]
[end]

form.p: Other mirrors: [if-any http] [for http][http][end] [end] [if-any ftp] [for ftp][ftp][end] [end] [if-any backup] [for backup][backup] (backup)[end] [end]

subsection.p: You may also consult the complete list of mirrors.

subsection.name: Tomcat Connectors JK 1.2
subsection.p: For more information concerning Tomcat Connectors (mod_jk), see the Tomcat Connectors (mod_jk) site.

div.span: Source (please choose the correct format for your platform)

ul.li:
JK 1.2.42 Source Release tar.gz (e.g. Unix, Linux, Mac OS)
[PGP], [MD5], [SHA1]

subsection.p: tomcat-connectors-1.2.42-src.* is signed by Mark Thomas (2F6059E7).

subsection.name: Verify the Integrity of the Files
subsection.p: You must verify the integrity of the downloaded files. We provide OpenPGP signatures for every release file. This signature should be matched against the KEYS file which contains the OpenPGP keys of Tomcat's Release Managers. We also provide MD5 and SHA1 checksums for every release file. After you download the file, you should calculate a checksum for your download, and make sure it is the same as ours.
